module.name: layered_2d_shape
module.keywords: module, planar, projected, shape, reference, relationship, axis, two-dimensional, 2D

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of information needed to describe planar or projected geometric models lying on two-dimensional plane, and relationship between them with two-dimensional transformation.

inscope.li: identification of a geometric model, that defines shape lying on a two-dimensional plane;
identification of a geometric model, that defines real features in product model projected on a two-dimensional plane;
identification of an association for reference purpose between two shapes;
items within the scope of application module Constructive solid geometry 2d, ISO/TS 10303-1731;
items within the scope of application module Extended elemental geometric shape, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1667;
items within the scope of application module Part template 2d shape, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1716;
items within the scope of application module Physical unit 2d shape, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1726.
